item.description:
Our next Tantra Together gathering will be a WONDERFUL experience led by Tantrikas Prana and John Rene coming to us from Portland, Maine!  This is sure to SELL OUT - so please reserve your space ASAP!  

 

Join my guests Prana Regina Barrett and John Rene Berard for an evening of Tantra yoga practice.

 

Prana Regina Barrett, BS, MIA, E-RYT, CYT, and John Rene Berard, BS, MB, RYT, CMT, have been sharing tantric practices, communication, and intimacy building techniques for more than 15 years; offering private sessions, workshops, and retreats in Portland, Maine, and world-wide. They have a gift for helping people to feel at ease within a safe and sacred container. People of all ages and sexual orientations are drawn to Prana and Rene’s authentic and playful style. For more information, click here: www.TantraToLove.com

 

Prana and Rene will share a gentle to moderate flow of Tantra yoga, qi gong, pranayama (breathing techniques), mantra and meditation to activate and ground the kundalini energy. Experience a deeper connection with Self and others.

 

All are welcome! Wear loose, comfy and sensual clothing. 

 

I'm so excited to have my friends and colleagues here for this Tantra gathering!  I hope you'll join us! 

 

Please click here to pay and reserve your spot:  http://relationship-coaching-site.com/payments/
item.name: Tantra Yoga with Guests Prana and Rene (open today and reserve your spot!)
